p: All cells used were cultured at 37 °C under 5 % CO 2. HeLa (ATCC: CCL-2), HEK 293T (CRL-1573), NIH 3T3 (CCL-92), Huh7 (CCL-185), and A549 (CCL-185) cells were grown in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle medium (DMEM; Lonza, Verviers, Belgium). BHK 21 (CCL-10) and Jurkat (TIB-152) cells were incubated in Roswell Park Memorial Institute medium (RPMI; Biowest, Nuaille, France). All media were supplemented with 10 % foetal bovine serum (PAA, Pasching, Austria) and 5 % L-glutamine (200 mM; Lonza, Verviers, Belgium).
